messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] 5 and a half
messages.msgSnippet: ... the ... You lost me, how things were with respect to learning, behavior, abilities, what? I do think 8 is the golden age for all of those, although I m not
messages.messageBody:
On Sun, 9 Dec 2001 12:01:30 EST RValvo7626@... writes:
> Can you boost me here and tell me how things are and were. After
the
> attack my mother hit me w/ I need some mental soothing.
>
> TIA NICKI~ Zoe is 5 1/2

You lost me, how things were with respect to learning, behavior,
abilities, what?

I do think 8 is the golden age for all of those, although I'm not sure
about 9...

Dar
